skills.name: Shield Riposte
skills.desc: This character gains a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Block. <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prepare Skill: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Slice.

skills.name: Shield Sweep
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, deals 2 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF"><span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.

skills.name: Arkhe: Ousia
skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After being damaged by characters with "Arkhe: Pneuma," this character will become <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Deactivated, and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">cannot use skills until this Round ends.
